post:
Will Hosting was established in February 2010 with a mission to provide Affordable and Reliable hosting services. We're excited to offer some great deals to the LET community.

<b>256MB OpenVZ | Phoenix AZ</b>
256MB RAM
256MB VSwap
1 IPV4 Address
1 E3-1240V2 Core (fair use)
1,000GB Transfer on a 1Gbp/s Port
30GB HDD RAID 10 Storage Space
Unmanaged

$35.88/year!
<a href="https://willhosting.com/portal/cart.php?a=add&pid=113">Click Here to Order</a>

<b>Product Addons</b>
Additional IPV4 Addresses - $1.00/month per IP

<b>How can you pay us?</b>
We currently accept all major credit cards as well as Paypal. 

<b>Test IP & Speed Test</b>
Test IP: 192.110.163.62
Test File: http://192.110.163.62/100MB.test

<b>Datacenter Information</b>
All Servers are hosted on nodes provided by our long time hosting partner IOFLOOD in a private cage at the PhoenixNAP datacenter in Phoenix, AZ. 

<b>Need a different configuration?</b>
Just ask! We can accommodate most custom quote requests.

<b>Questions?</b> 
Skype: willbogeek
Email: support@willhosting.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/willhosting

Thanks,
~Will
